Pre-Game Insights: The pitch at the Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium, Mohali is a balanced pitch with an average 1st innings score of 163 runs in the last 20 matches.
Pacers have been very successful at this venue, taking 67% of the total wickets.
In the 23 matches played between India and Australia, Australian All Rounders have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while Bowlers have earned the most fantasy points for India.
